title: Spicy Mexican quinoa salad
ingredients: ['Salad', '1 (400g) tin black beans, drained and rinsed', '280g cooked quinoa', '165g frozen corn', '1 red pepper, diced', '50g chopped spring onion', '25g finely chopped coriander, plus more for garnish', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', 'Dressing', '120ml olive oil', '1 lime, juiced', '2 tablespoons honey', '6 pickled jalapeno pepper slices, chopped', '1/4 teaspoon dry mustard', '1/4 teaspoon paprika']
